name: Bubble
overview: A collect'em up style game created by Trond Brenna and available in 64'er 1991/06. Bubble is a game of five levels. On a grid-like Playing field are some red and blue stones distributed. You have to collect them with your so-called bubble, a ball-like structure. For every red there are four, blue stones are worth 2 points. But the whole thing would be without difficulty and not fun at all if it weren't for an enemy computer-controlled object chasing you. If it catches you, one of your lives is wasted. Once all stones have been collected, the next level, of course, a little harder so you won't lose interest in collecting stones.
